txt.en: 'The Orcs seem undeterred though their leader falls in battle. Is there more to this infestation? Quickly return to Baglan and tell them what you learned here.'

At the outskirts of Caranost, a brave group holds a line against an onslaught of orcs pouring across the bridge from the ruins. The latest assault threatens to break the resolve of the warriors at SÃ­rlond. It falls to you to bolster them as they come under assault.

Having scaled the ruins of Caranost, you find yourself near the Orc command. Fight through the defenders within the ruins and engage the leader of the tribe that makes the ruin their home. This will surely break the Orcs' will and drive them back into hiding.
Defeat Orcs at the Caranost Command Post ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
